data.name: Rocket League® - Hot Wheels® Triple Threat DLC Pack
data.detailed_description: Celebrate the 50th anniversary of Hot Wheels® with three sleek and powerful street machines: Gazella GT™, MR11, and FAST 4WD! Also included: themed Decals, Wheels for each vehicle, and fierce Hot Wheels creature Toppers.
data.about_the_game: Celebrate the 50th anniversary of Hot Wheels® with three sleek and powerful street machines: Gazella GT™, MR11, and FAST 4WD! Also included: themed Decals, Wheels for each vehicle, and fierce Hot Wheels creature Toppers.
data.short_description: Celebrate the 50th anniversary of Hot Wheels® with three sleek and powerful street machines: Gazella GT™, MR11, and FAST 4WD! Also included: themed Decals, Wheels for each vehicle, and fierce Hot Wheels creature Toppers.
data.supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Dutch, Portuguese, Japanese, Korean, Russian, Turkish, Polish

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 or Newer
  • Processor: 2.4 GHz Dual core
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 260 or ATI 4850
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 8 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 7 or Newer
  • Processor: 2.5+ GHz Quad core
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 660 or better, ATI 7950 or better
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 8 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Gamepad or Controller Recommended

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: MacOS X 10.8.5
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 2.4 GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 4.1 - ATI Radeon HD 5670, NVIDIA GeForce GT 640M, Intel HD Graphics 4000 or Iris Pro Graphics
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 8 GB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: MacOS X 10.8.5 or Newer
  • Processor: Intel Core i7 2.4 GHz+
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 4.1 - ATI Radeon HD 5670, NVIDIA GeForce GT 640M
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 8 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Gamepad or Controller Recommended

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Processor: 2.4+ GHz Quad core
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 260 or ATI 4850
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 8 GB available space
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Processor: 2.5+ GHz Quad core
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 660 or better, ATI 7950 or better
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 8 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Gamepad or Controller Recommended
